flowchart LR
    subgraph Source["Source (Producer)"]
        SRC["Data Source"]
    end

    subgraph AXIS["AXI-Stream"]
        subgraph Signals["Stream Signals"]
            TDATA["tdata[WIDTH-1:0]"]
            TVALID["tvalid"]
            TREADY["tready"]
            TLAST["tlast"]
            TKEEP["tkeep[BYTES-1:0]"]
        end

        subgraph Protocol["Handshake"]
            HS["Transfer when\ntvalid & tready"]
        end
    end

    subgraph Sink["Sink (Consumer)"]
        SNK["Data Sink"]
    end

    SRC -->|"tvalid"| Protocol
    SNK -->|"tready"| Protocol
    TDATA --> SNK
    TLAST --> SNK
    TKEEP --> SNK
repo_description: This site is hopefully a springboard for others to learn about coding in System Verilog and experimenting with FPGAs.
